heading: What is Duckies?
content: Duckies is a community project built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) network. We believe in the power of community to drive changes and that is why we are committed to building value through our community to the rest of the world

heading: What is the ecosystem token?
content: $DUCKIE is the ecosystem token and it has been listed on Pancakeswap - the leading DEX on the BSC network

heading: Is the liquidity locked?
content: Yes! We have locked our liquidity for 2 years and we plan on extending it as soon as the unlock period reaches. This is to assure our investors that we are not a "rugpull" scheme

heading: Will there be token burn?
content: Yes! We have commited 20% of our token to burn but we can decide to burn more if our community decides to

heading: How can I help?
content: You can help by joining our ever growing community, refer your friends and help shill us on social media

heading: What are the plans for the future?
content: Duckies community is commited to building value and that is why we will be building our P2E game and we have plans for NFT release to support it
